text.text_translated:
A prophecy is when someone says that something will happen in the future.  
A chance is when two things happen by luck, not by a plan.  

Sometimes, we dream of a phone call from an old friend.  
Sometimes, we dream about the death of someone close.  
These dreams often happen by chance, not because of a prophecy.  
Also, we usually choose to forget all the times we dream about these things but they do not happen.

best_attempt.text_translated:
A prophecy is when someone says that something will happen in the future.  
A coincidence is when two things happen by chance, not because of a plan.  

Sometimes, we dream about a phone call from an old friend.  
Sometimes, we dream about the death of someone close.  
These dreams are usually a coincidence, not a prophecy.  
Also, we forget many dreams that do not happen.
